name: df-rrn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(crrn, cmpt(s0, cfn, cmpo(s1, s2, co(cr, cmap, cv(s0)), co(cr, cmap, cv(s0)), cfv(csqrt, csu(s3, cv(s0), co(co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3))), cexp, nat2))))))
comment: Define n-dimensional Euclidean space as a metric space with the standard Euclidean norm given by the quadratic mean. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
